summary:
When sideways power attacks are hit, there is possibility of knock down the opponent.
This is not intended to add new Perk, be due to existing Perk synergy.
In addition, 1.0PLUS or higher can add simple and small adjustment to One-Handed, Two-Handed, Block, Heavy Armor, Light Armor.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-fW16rcG1yIs/VN8CnAJY4JI/AAAAAAAAA9E/Aib87BX3x-s/s32-no/av-2082630.jpg[/img]
[size=4]When sideways power attacks are hit, there is possibility of knock down the opponent. This is not intended to add new Perk, be due to existing Perk synergy. In addition, 1.0PLUS or higher can add simple and small adjustment to One-Handed, Two-Handed, Block, Heavy Armor, Light Armor.[/size]

One-Handed Request
Armsman(4) + Critical Charge + Savage Strike

Two-Handed Request
Barbarian(4) + Devastating Blow + Great Critical Charge

--PLUS contents--

One-Handed
Armsman(1)
Attacks of one-handed weapons are 2% faster.
Armsman(2)
Attacks of one-handed weapons are 4% faster.
Armsman(3)
Attacks of one-handed weapons are 6% faster.
Armsman(4)
Attacks of one-handed weapons are 8% faster.
Armsman(5)
Attacks of one-handed weapons are 10% faster.

Two-Handed
Barbarian(1)
When blocking action with two-handed weapon, stamina regenerates 15% faster.
Barbarian(2)
When blocking action with two-handed weapon, stamina regenerates 30% faster.
Barbarian(3)
When blocking action with two-handed weapon, stamina regenerates 45% faster.
Barbarian(4)
When blocking action with two-handed weapon, stamina regenerates 60% faster.
Barbarian(5)
When blocking action with two-handed weapon, stamina regenerates 80% faster.

Block
Shield Wall(1)
When blocking action with shield, stamina regenerates 10% faster.
Shield Wall(2)
When blocking action with shield, stamina regenerates 20% faster.
Shield Wall(3)
When blocking action with shield, stamina regenerates 30% faster.
Shield Wall(4)
When blocking action with shield, stamina regenerates 40% faster.
Shield Wall(5)
When blocking action with shield, stamina regenerates 50% faster.

Heavy Armor
Juggernaut(1)
Stamina regenerates 4% faster and 2% reflect melee damage back to the enemy while wearing all Heavy Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Juggernaut(2)
Stamina regenerates 8% faster and 4% reflect melee damage back to the enemy while wearing all Heavy Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Juggernaut(3)
Stamina regenerates 12% faster and 7% reflect melee damage back to the enemy while wearing all Heavy Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Juggernaut(4)
Stamina regenerates 16% faster and 11% reflect melee damage back to the enemy while wearing all Heavy Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Juggernaut(5)
Stamina regenerates 20% faster and 15% reflect melee damage back to the enemy while wearing all Heavy Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.

Light Armor
Agile Defender(1)
4% faster run/walk while wearing all Light Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Agile Defender(2)
8% faster run/walk while wearing all Light Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Agile Defender(3)
12% faster run/walk while wearing all Light Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Agile Defender(4)
16% faster run/walk while wearing all Light Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.
Agile Defender(5)
20% faster run/walk while wearing all Light Armor: head, chest, hands, feet.

*This will compete with MOD to trigger spell by sideways power attacks.

--Uninstall--
1st. Equipped with Two-Handed weapon, and save gamedata.
2nd. Uninstall by BAIN etc.. Or delete the files in Data folder that is included in archives.

--Update--
1st. After uninstalling, save gamedata.
2nd. Install by BAIN etc..

*Update ver 1.1PLUS
Fix One-Handed Bonus.
Heavy Armor and Light Armor Bonus don't include helm.
